body_html: I understand the sentiment, but Swift, C# and Java are not "every" language, and this is not "every project" either. This is open source and Github so there might be enough hands to man the maintanance of ports to the most popular languages for such an important piece of software. Python is quite popular in academia but a little less popular with the bulk of private sector developers.

body: I understand the sentiment, but Swift, C# and Java are not "every" language, and this is not "every project" either. This is open source and Github so there might be enough hands to man the maintanance of ports to the most popular languages for such an important piece of software. Python is quite popular in academia but a little less popular with the bulk of private sector developers.
